capability.capability-description: The ability to manage the process of assessing liability for a tax or charge from the identification of an obligation to calculation and adjustment of liabilities.
The ability to manage business rules that enable the assessment of a liability for or an exemption from a tax and charge.
The ability to manage the rates and thresholds used in the determination of assessments.
The ability to manage the date periods to which a set of assessment rules and thresholds apply.
Ability to maintain the information needed to make assessments during a date time period
The ability to manage the identification and relationships of property relevant to revenue and rental bond management
The ability to define new leases
The ability to manage the surrender of a lease and the issuing of new leases with revised property characteristics.
The ability to manage variations to leases that may alter their definition or there approve usage.
The ability to manage the ownership of a parcel of land.
The ability to value and re-value are parcel of land.
The ability to generate and quantify the factors that impact on property valuation
The ability to identify comparative ratings between the values of properties.
The ability to match property characteristics to valuation factors and valuation bench marks
The ability to generate a valuation for an identified property.
The ability to validate a generated valuation
The ability to manage accounts receivable
Ability to manage accounts payable
Ability to manage financial accounting
Ability to manage management accounting
The ability to manage the enterprises financial accounts.
The ability to manage notifications and advice notices
The ability to manage the development, testing and implementation of notice designs
